---
title: Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation (PNF)
---



# Progression

### ROM

- End range: Move from neutral to slight ROM
    - Eventually build up to end ROM
- Moving through ROM: Start moving through small ROM
- For extreme ROM:
    - Start moving into it
    



# PNF for the Overhead Athlete

- Perturbation training
    - RTC highly involved in the dynamic stabilization unit of the shoulder
- Give opportunity to recruit fast twitch mm fibers due to faster mvmts
